name: TeamCardFive
description: Team section with overlapping portrait cards in responsive flex layout showing centered vertical cards with name and role.

description.example: The talented people behind our success

name.note: Team member name displayed at 2xl font-medium, centered with truncate

role.note: Role/title displayed at base size with 75% opacity, centered with truncate

imageSrc.note: Image path for team member photo (aspect-square in card wrapper with p-2, rounded-theme)

videoSrc.note: Video path for team member (aspect-square in card wrapper with p-2, rounded-theme)

imageAlt.note: Alt text for image (defaults to member name if not provided)

videoAriaLabel.note: ARIA label for video (defaults to member name if not provided)

itemRules.note: Works best with 4-8 team members. Mobile: 2 per row with overlap. Desktop: up to 4 per row with overlap and wrap support for additional rows.

propsSchema.team: Array<{ id: string, name: string, role: string, imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <TeamCardFive team={[{ id: '1', name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'CEO & Founder', imageSrc: '/team/sarah.jpg' }, { id: '2', name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'CTO', imageSrc: '/team/michael.jpg' }, { id: '3', name: 'Emma Davis', role: 'Head of Design', imageSrc: '/team/emma.jpg' }, { id: '4', name: 'James Wilson', role: 'Lead Developer', imageSrc: '/team/james.jpg' }]} animationType="slide-up" title="Meet Our Team" description="The talented people behind our success" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} tag="Team" tagIcon={Users} />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
Do not use less than 2 items
Do not use more than 12 items
